Detailed Description

Indicator that has several qualities.

Returns the largest possible value for this indicator (default = 100).

INT ValueIndicator::GetMinimumValue (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the lowest possible value for this indicator (default = 0).

INT ValueIndicator::GetStep (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the calculated value step which is necessary to change the indicatior. (1 per default).

Reimplemented in IconValueIndicator.

INT ValueIndicator::GetValue (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the currently assigned value.

void ValueIndicator::SetRange (  INT  min,
INT  max
) 
 

Specifies the range for this position indicator. Per default the minimum value is 0, the maximum value is 100.

void ValueIndicator::SetValue (  INT  value  ) 
 

Assigns a value to the indicator. Values larger than the value returned by GetMaximumValue are turncated to the maximum value. Values less than the value returned by GetMinimumValue are turncated to the minimum value.
